participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Jake loves outdoor activities and values his personal time.
participant_1.background: I continued to run after recovering from my injury, but I took it slower and more carefully. I like to wear comfortable clothes when I play music and go hunting. My family tries to convince me to dump my fiancé. My time is my most valuable possession. I am in a motorcycle club.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Lila balances her work as a writer with being a mother and enjoys exploring new stories.
participant_2.background: I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work. I have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures. Both my parents were over 6 foot tall. I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.

content.text: Hey!
Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a run. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting settled in at work.
Oh, cool! What do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I have a crib in my office so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
That's really cool! I love to write too. Do you have anything published?
I have a couple of short stories published in some magazines. I'm working on a novel now.
Oh, that's exciting! I'm sure it's going to be great.
Thanks! I hope so.
What's your favorite thing about being a writer?
I love the freedom to create my own world and characters. I also love the challenge of trying to tell a good story.
That's awesome. I'm glad you love your job.
Thanks! I am pretty lucky.
What's your favorite sci-fi space adventure?
I love the Expanse series by James S.A. Corey. It's a really well-written space opera with a lot of political intrigue.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's one of my favorites.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
